name: Voice of the Wind - Walking Simulator
name_original: Voice of the Wind - Walking Simulator
description:
Voice of The Wind - Walking Simulator

This is a low-poly game that was made for therapeutic purposes. It is a walking experience focusing mostly on sound and color to convey the message of peacefulness while playing as a  deer exploring the grassy, forested land you are in.

Play as a lonely deer who ventures into a dream-like environment, under the trees, as sounds of bird's voices are heard.
